name: ComBox
description:
Description -

A simple 2D arcade game about combining boxes in order to have as few boxes on-screen as possible!  This game was made in one week for the BlackThornProd Game Jam with the theme "Less is More".  All code, art, music, and sounds were made during the jam.  The font used was Arcade Classic by Pizzadude (https://www.dafont.com/arcade-classic-2.font).  It would be greatly appreciated if you left a review!

Theme

- The fewer boxes on-screen, the longer you can survive/the easier it is to manage them

- The fewer boxes on-screen the more points you get when you combine boxes
